Description:
V. MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Engineering with Mechanical background.
Minimum 7+ years of experience in Project Engineering in oil and gas or process industry. Commissioning, Start-Up and Brownfield experience preferred.
Proficient with Project Management and Business processes including planning, cost estimation, cost control, contract management and procurement, Management of Change, Control of Work, Quality Management Systems and EHS management systems.
Experience in Mechanically biased projects during design, construction, pre-commissioning and testing.
Must have strong leadership and multi-discipline coordination skills and be able to plan work logically.
Hardworking, proactive and possesses teamwork attitude with leadership and problem-solving skills.
Good English communication skills.
Competent in using MS word, Excel and PowerPoint applicationsJob Details
